mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eat_reply (eatbno, reply, replyer) VALUES (#{eatbno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.select: SELECT r.eatrno eatrno, r.eatbno eatbno, r.reply reply, r.replyer replyer, r.replyDate replyDate, r.updateDate updateDate, r.likes likes, m.nickName replyerName FROM eat_reply r JOIN tbl_member2 m on r.replyer = m.userid WHERE r.eatrno = #{eatrno}
mapper.update: UPDATE eat_reply SET reply = #{reply}, replyer = #{replyer}, updateDate = now() WHERE eatrno = #{eatrno}
mapper.select: SELECT r.eatrno eatrno, r.eatbno eatbno, r.reply reply, r.replyer replyer, r.replyDate replyDate, r.updateDate updateDate, r.likes likes, m.nickName replyerName FROM eat_reply r JOIN tbl_member2 m ON r.replyer = m.userid WHERE r.eatbno = #{eatbno} ORDER BY r.eatrno ASC
